Missed call Contact details updated Group details updated Android 9 Notification Sound Bug Olvid is unable to use the message notification sound you selected. It was deactivated. A bug in Android 9 prevents the use of custom notification sounds to apps that do not request access to external storage/SD card.

You should try selecting a standard notification sound. Until then, your notifications will remain silent! seconds minutes hours days years Export app databases Exporting app databases allows you to inspect exactly what Olvid stores internally.

Export app databases By clicking export, Olvid will generate a zip file containing the databases of both the engine and the application itself. Unlock the app to connect to the web client Security check
Unlock the app to access these settings Require unlock before each connection When this security feature is active, connecting to the webclient will require to unlock Olvid. Disable Google push notifications If you disable push notifications you will not be notified of new messages when Olvid is in the background. Keep in mind that Olvid never sends any data in these push notifications: the only information Google gets from them is that you received a message in Olvid. Maintain a permanent WebSocket connection When activated, Olvid will maintain a permanent connection to its server. This can improve message reception speed and reliability, but it may drain your battery. Use low bandwidth during audio calls When activated, the bandwidth used during calls will be reduced. This may reduce sound quality but can improve connection stability. Olvid is running Only disable push Enable permanent WebSocket Disable push notifications If you only disable Google push notifications, you will not be notified instantly of new messages.

You may instead want to enable a permanent WebSocket connection to Olvid's servers that can serve the same purpose (but may drain your battery). Use a foreground service Having a foreground service prevents Olvid from being stopped by the system. A small icon is displayed in your notifications area and can be hidden in the system preferences. Share app and OS version with Olvid When activated, your app will share its version and the version of your OS (and nothing more) with the Olvid servers. This data is extremely valuable when rolling-out new features. %1$dh %2$02dm %3$02ds %1$dm %2$02ds Notify when a server certificate changes When activated, Olvid will notify you every time the SSL/TLS certificate of one of the servers it connects to changes. This can either be that the sending of a message was cancelled (the message will never reach you), or that a larger message (typically with attachment) has not finished uploading yet (you should receive it soon). Audio recording permission required Olvid's secure phone calls need the permission to record audio from your microphone.
We also recommend granting the permission to manage phone calls so that regular incoming phone calls can be handled properly. Update key Unable to update your identity provider signature key. Please contact your administrator and only press "update key" if he can confirm the key change was intentional. If unsure, press "cancel". Identity provider removed It seems that your account was removed from your company's identity provider. If you left your company, this is normal and you may continue using Olvid as a free user.

If you believe this is an error, please contact your administrator to re-register this identity provider with Olvid. Setup backups It's time to setup backups! If you were to lose your device, or to uninstall Olvid by mistake, you would lose your profiles, all your contacts, and all your groups 😱. Luckily for you, it is possible to setup secure backups 😅.

Press "Setup backups" to begin. Keycloak configuration Configuration link provided in the keycloak Olvid Management Console. Deleting a profile will delete any information related to this profile on your device. This includes, your contacts and groups and the content of all your discussions (messages and attachments) for this profile. Your other profiles will not be affected by this operation.
If you have enabled backups in Olvid, your future backups will not contain any trace of this profile and you may not be able to restore it.

Press "next" to choose how this profile should be deleted. Deleting a profile will delete any information related to this profile on your device. This includes, your contacts and groups and the content of all your discussions (messages and attachments) for this profile.

This is your only visible profile and if you have any hidden profile, they will be deleted simultaneously.

Press "next" to choose how this profile should be deleted. Deleting a profile will delete any information related to this profile on your device. This includes, your contacts and groups and the content of all your discussions (messages and attachments) for this profile.

This is your only visible profile and if you have any hidden profile, they will be deleted simultaneously.

Press "next" to choose how this profile should be deleted. Delete profile everywhere Type "%1$s" here to proceed If you choose to delete your profile everywhere:
 - it will be deleted locally and on your contacts's devices
 - you will leave groups you joined
 - groups you manage will be disbanded

If you do not delete your profile everywhere it will only be deleted locally on your device. Unless you plan to restore a backup on another device, your contacts may still try sending you messages and might not realize these messages cannot be delivered. Your current profile appears to be inactive, meaning you probably transferred it to another device. If you plan to continue using this profile on your other device, you can safely delete it here.

If you do not want to use this profile ever again, you will need to reactivate it on this device first, wait for secure channels with your contacts to be recreated, and only then delete this profile choosing the "delete everywhere" option. Your profile is currently enable on multiple devices.

If you choose to delete your profile everywhere:
 - it will be deleted from all your devices and on your contacts's devices
 - you will leave groups you joined
 - groups you manage will be disbanded

If you do not delete your profile everywhere it will only be deleted locally and you can continue using it normally on your other devices. Press "reactivate my profile on this device" to see which devices are currently active and how your profile can be reactivated on this device. Introducing multi-profile! Olvid now supports having multiple completely independent profiles inside one app. Each profile can use a different name and profile picture and has a separate set of contacts, groups, and discussions. You may also have hidden profiles that require an additional password to be accessed.

Want to try this out? Tap on your profile picture at the top left of the main screen and simply press "add a profile" to get started! Olvid now allows mentioning a user in a discussion 🫵! Simply type @ followed by a letter or their name to see who can be mentioned.
In addition, when muting 💤 a discussion or a profile, you can now choose to only be notified when you are explicitly mentioned in a message.

Note that your contacts will need to update to the latest version of Olvid to actually see you mentioned them. Notifications To be notified when a contact sends you a message, you need to allow Olvid to display notifications. Notifications disabled Notifications are currently disabled for Olvid. Unless you enable them, you will not be notified when receiving a message from your contacts. Camera access Granting Olvid access to the camera allows you to send pictures taken directly from within Olvid, or to scan the ID of other users. Camera access denied Audio recording Granting Olvid access to the microphone allows you to record voice messages and is required to start or receive secure calls. Audio recording disabled Location enabled Enabling your location allows you to use the "share your location" feature. Location disabled Location permission granted Granting Olvid access to your location allows you to use the "share your location" feature. Location permission denied Battery optimization Battery optimization on Android works by delaying certain background events to run them in a batch. This may delay the reception of inbound Olvid messages and calls.

Olvid is currently allowed to "always run in background". Battery optimization on Android works by delaying certain background events to run them in a batch. This may delay the reception of inbound Olvid messages and calls.

To ensure that your messages are received promptly, you should allow Olvid to "always run in background". Background restriction Olvid needs to be allowed to run in background to function properly. Enabling background restriction would, for example, prevent Olvid from receiving messages in the background. Olvid has "background restriction" enabled. Olvid will not be able to function properly until you remove it from the "restricted apps" list.

You can fix this by pressing "App settings" and heading to the battery usage section. Permission to set alarms Olvid relies on alarms to precisely schedule screen lock and ephemeral messages deletion. This permission is set correctly. Olvid relies on alarms to precisely schedule screen lock and ephemeral messages deletion.
The permission to set such alarms has been revoked, which may cause these security features to misbehave.

We strongly encourage you to allow setting alarms and reminders by pressing "App settings". Incoming call notifications Incoming calls need to display a full screen "answer call" notification. This permission is set correctly. Incoming calls need to display a full screen "answer call" notification. Olvid currently does not have permission to open such full screen notifications. Press "App settings" to allow full screen notifications. Google Play Services unavailable Permanent WebSocket connection to Olvid's servers is properly configured. Google Play Services are not available on your device. Olvid relies on these services to be notified of incoming messages. Without them, you will only receive new messages when Olvid is in the foreground.

Profile transfer restriction Important Your company requires you to authenticate with their identity provider on your new device to access your profile. Why? Your company requires additional authentication: you will need to authenticate with their identity provider directly on this new device.
